bibleStudy.title: The Complete Bible in a Year Plan Floral
bibleStudy.description:
Read the entire Bible in one year!
Do you desire to read through the Word of God? Do it with this plan! Broken down into monthly and daily readings. Complete with a page designed for taking notes. Reccord what you learn and want to study more. Start any month of the year!
Printing Instructions for binding:
- Set up for double side printing
- Reccomended to print pages 1-2, 11-12 on cardstock
- Print 169 copies of pages 9-10 to have one side of a note sheet for each day's reading.
Printing Instructions for just the plan:
Print pages 3-8 double sided and laminate
bibleStudy.pdf: assets/The Complete Bible in a Year Reading Plan - Floral Design.pdf
